short_summary: Repair Kits and Parts for COMPRESSOR & VALVE
description: Tender Notice for COMPRESSOR & VALVE Repair Kit
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-253119/A

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Description**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide repair kits and parts for compressor and valve items. The delivery is required at Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Requirements**

* 12 x Repair kits for Pressure Regulating Valve, Part No.: 389-1874, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP
* 20 x Repair kits for Pressure Regulating Valve, Part No.: 389-1874, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP
* 7 x Compressor Repair Kits, Part No.: 389-1875, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP
* 5 x Compressor Repair Kits, Part No.: 389-1875, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP
* 24 x Repair kits for Pressure Regulating Valve, Part No.: 389-1876, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP
* 16 x Repair kits for Pressure Regulating Valve, Part No.: 389-1876, NCAGE: 13669, TESCOM CORP

**Bidder Information**

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will be rejected.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Tender Documents**

* Tender notice: available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51364/rfp-w8482-253119-a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51364/rfp-w8482-253119-a-en.pdf)
* Tender documents: available upon request.

**Contracting Entity**
* Directorate Maritime Procurement
* 101 Colonel by Drive
* Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
* Canada
* Phone: (819) 939
